sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - ஒப்புக்கொடு, கூடநில், முன்பாக நில், காண்பி
2. to stand beside, stand by or near, to be at hand, be present

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G3488 and G2476; to stand beside, that is, (transitively) to exhibit, proffer, (specifically) recommend, (figuratively) substantiate; or (intransitively) to be at hand (or ready), aid: - assist, bring before, command, commend, give presently, present, prove, provide, shew, stand (before, by, here, up, with), yield.
